Chattanooga.Chattanooga High School:
Chattanooga High School was founded in the fall of 1874 in Chattanooga, Hamilton County, Tennessee.

The school, sometimes called City High School, has evolved into two high schools: the Chattanooga High School Center for Creative Arts and the Chattanooga School for the Arts & Sciences. 


== History ==
City High on 3rd street ceased to exist in the 1963-64 school, when the school moved to its present site.
